rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action to close Problem
rule.fullDesc: Run Scheduled Action to close Problem
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":1,"calcField":"update.time","calcInterval":"7 00:00:00","calcScript":"","actionCondition":"(rcStatus in $L.file=\"Resolved\" and tod()>=(update.time in $L.file+'7 00:00:00'))","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"expression\"><Expression caption=\"\">\"rcStatus in $L.file="Resolved" and tod()>=(update.time in $L.file+'7 00:00:00')\"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","rulesetName":"pbm.close.open.tasks","action":"close.auto"}
